mapper.select: SELECT A.name, T.accountId, T.id, T.date, T.description, T.amount FROM transactionTable T INNER JOIN accountTable A ON T.accountId = A.id
SELECT A.name, T.accountId, T.id, T.date, T.description, T.amount FROM transactionTable T INNER JOIN accountTable A ON T.accountId = A.id WHERE T.id = #{T.id}
SELECT A.name, T.accountId, T.id, T.date, T.description, T.amount FROM transactionTable T INNER JOIN accountTable A ON T.accountId = A.id WHERE T.accountId = #{T.accountId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactionTable (accountId, id, date, description, amount) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{id}, #{date}, #{description}, #{amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE transactionTable SET accountId = #{accountId}, id = #{id}, date = #{date}, description = #{description}, amount = #{amount} WHERE id = #{id}
